name: Push-ups
description: A classic strength exercise that strengthens the arms, shoulders, and chest.

name: Squats
description: An effective exercise to strengthen the thighs, glutes, and improve endurance.

name: Plank
description: An isometric exercise that engages the core and abdominal muscles to improve stability.

name: Lunges
description: A lower body exercise that targets the quads, hamstrings, and glutes.

name: Burpees
description: A full-body exercise that combines a squat, push-up, and jump to improve endurance.

name: Jumping Jacks
description: A great warm-up exercise that increases heart rate and improves coordination.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: A high-intensity cardio and core exercise that mimics a climbing motion.

name: Sit-ups
description: A classic abdominal exercise that strengthens the core muscles.

name: Leg Raises
description: A core-strengthening exercise that targets the lower abdominal muscles.

name: Jump Rope
description: A cardio-intensive exercise that improves coordination and endurance.

name: Triceps Dips
description: A great bodyweight exercise to strengthen the triceps and shoulders.

name: Wall Sit
description: An isometric exercise that builds endurance and strength in the legs.

name: Russian Twists
description: A rotational core exercise that engages the oblique muscles and improves balance.
